CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 28, 1957, pg. A9 reads: "Visitors Enjoy Girl Friends' Party - Holiday visitors got a bang out of the Girl Friends' Christmas party held at the Flamingo, were, left to right: Florence Byrd Davis, president of the Richmond (Va.) Chapter of GFs; Eunice Hamilton Cochran of Brooklyn, N.Y., and Nell Marie Hamilton of Atlanta, Ga., both sisters of Theron B. Hamilton of Pittsburgh. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Girlfriends Inc. members: Florence Byrd Davis, Eunice Hamilton Cochran, and Nell Marie Hamilton, gathered in interior of Flamingo for Christmas party
